task.en: Help me zoom in the current document to exactly 300%.
task.zh: 帮我放大当前文稿到300%的大小。
task.ar: ساعدني في تكبير المستند الحالي إلى 300% بالضبط.
task.ja: 現在の文書を300%に拡大してください。

pre_command.en: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to make new document with properties {document template:template "Modern Letter"}'
pre_command.zh: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to make new document with properties {document template:template "现代报告"}'
pre_command.ar: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to make new document with properties {document template:template "تقرير معاصر"}'
pre_command.ja: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to make new document with properties {document template:template "ミニマリストレポート"}'
pre_command.ru: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to make new document with properties {document template:template "Минималистичный отчет"}'

grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attributes of menu button "Zoom" of toolbar 1 of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "300%" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attributes of menu button "缩放" of toolbar 1 of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "300%" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attributes of menu button "تكبير/تصغير" of toolbar 1 of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "300" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attributes of menu button "拡大/縮小" of toolbar 1 of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "300%" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attributes of menu button "Масштаб" of toolbar 1 of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "300" && echo "True" || echo "False"
